text: الذين يوفون بعهد الله ولا ينقضون الميثق

translations.translation: those who fulfil Allah's contract and do not break their agreement;
Who fulfil their covenant with God and do not break their agreement,
those who fulfil their covenant with Allah and do not break their compact after firmly confirming it;
Those who fulfill their promise to and covenant with God,
Those who fulfil the pact of Allah, and do not renege on the covenant.
Those who fulfill, the covenant of Allah and break not the trust.
Those who fulfil the promise of Allah and do not break the covenant,
who fulfil God's covenant, and break not the compact,
Such as keep the pact of Allah, and break not the covenant;
they who are true to their bond with God and never break their covenant;
Those who fulfil the covenant of Allah, and violate not the bond.
—those who fulfill Allah’s covenant and do not break the pledge solemnly made,
Those who fulfil the covenant of Allah and fail not in their plighted word;
Those who fulfill the Covenant of Allah and break not the Mithaq (bond, treaty, covenant);
who fulfill their promise to Allah and do not break their pledge;
Those who fulfill the promise to God, and do not violate the agreement.
Those who fulfill the covenant of Allah and do not break the contract,

[13:20] such as fulfil God’s covenant, [meaning] the one that was taken from them while they were still atoms — or [meaning] any covenant — and do not break the pact, by abandoning belief, or [religious] obligations;
(Such as keep the pact of Allah) they fulfil the obligations of Allah, (and break not the covenant) they do not refrain from the obligations of Allah;

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ولا يحصل ذلك إلا بالبصيرة وهم { ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ } الذي عهدوا معه حين رش رشحات نور الوجود علىأراضي استعداداتهم { وَلاَ يَنقُضُونَ ٱلْمِيثَاقَ } [الرعد: 20] الوثيق
 بل يحفظونه ويواظبون على حفظه دائماً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
ثم وصفهم بقوله: { الذين يُوفون بعهد الله } ما عقدوه على نفوسهم من معرفة عظمة الربوبية والقيام بوظائف العبودية
 حين قالوا: { بلى }
 { ولا ينقُضُون الميثاق } ما أوثقوه على نفوسهم
 وتحملوه من المواثيق التي بينهم وبين الله
 وبينهم وبين عباد الله
 وهو تعميم بعد تخصيص تأكيداً على الوفاء بالعهود
